overview: As customers you've been involved with the rivalry between Boss Sexton's studio managers.... Vancouver's Mark Wolff, L.A.'s Brian Maxon, and Toronto's Tom Flex. Who's #1? Who's got the best body? Who's the most popular? Well, gentlemen... get a firm grip on your joy sticks because FLEXTASY is Tom Flex's latest video bid to be the "popular" choice for #1.
title: FLEXTASY
